#summary Brief summary of how oDemo is structured and how to adapt it.

= Introduction =
  This page will give information on how odemo is structured and how to adapt it to other projects.

  OmegaLib will eventually allow for an application to seamlessly port from a high tech device, like OmegaTable, to a lower tech device, like a personal laptop.  Currently odemo will support a laptop based implementation.  
Fully functional configuration files support is currently being implemented.  In the meantime, users can familiarize themselves with how the library works.  These concepts can be easily translated to more complex devices.
